## Authenticator class

Base Authenticator class for other Authenticators to extend. Not intended to be used as a stand-alone authenticator.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Authenticator implements AuthenticatorInterface 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [AuthenticatorInterface](./ibm-cloud-sdk-core.authenticatorinterface.md)

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [authenticate(requestOptions)](./ibm-cloud-sdk-core.authenticator.authenticate.md) |  | Augment the request with authentication information. |
|  [authenticationType()](./ibm-cloud-sdk-core.authenticator.authenticationtype.md) |  | Retrieves the authenticator's type. The returned value will be the same string that is used when configuring an instance of the authenticator with the "<!-- -->&lt;<!-- -->service\_name<!-- -->&gt;<!-- -->\_AUTH\_TYPE" configuration property (e.g. "basic", "iam", etc.). This function should be overridden in each authenticator implementation class that extends this class. |
